dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 218 IH: Expedited Removal Codification Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Van Drew introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To require agencies to publish an advance notice of proposed rulemaking for major rules, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Expedited Removal Codification Act of 2023.
The notice titled, Designating Aliens for Expedited Removal, issued by the Department of Homeland Security on July 23, 2019 (84 Fed. Reg. 35409), shall have the full force and effect of law.
